title: How do you even get honor 5?
body: I've been at honor lvl 4 for like a month and a half. I got to level 4 in 2 weeks. I get 2 honors every game since then. But I haven't gotten honor level 5 yet. So how do I get level 5?

replies.body: I went ahead and double checked, and it does look like you're still gaining Honor at the normal pace. Keep in mind that certain types of in-game behavior might not immediately get you punished, but it can still weigh down your honor gains.
